text:
Graydon Ausraus, President
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
University of Alabama
University, Alabama
Dear Graydon:
In answer to your request for reaction concerning the
conference with Boh VanDuyn early in June, 3 suggest that you
make arrangements for such a conference and proceed to set it
up at whatever time is possible.
Sincerely,
Armand L. Hunter
Secretary
ALH/hsa
cc: Executive Committee
